name: NextGen Game Repair Inc.
tag_list: ps3-repair, xbox-360-repair, wii-repair, psp-repair, iphone-repair, video-game-console-repair, ylod-repair, rrod-repair
overview: NextGen Game Repair, Your # 1 Repair source for professional nextgen console and handheld game system repairs. We specialize in complete and reliable Xbox 360 repair, Playstation 3 repair, PS3 Repair, Wii Repair, PSP Repair & DS Repair. We use a top of the line BGA Rework/Reball repair station, top quality parts and professional knowledge in expert troubleshooting for all our repairs. All work is backed by a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee, a 90-Day Limited Warranty on all REPAIRS or a 180-Day Limited Warranty on any BGA REBALL service.
